oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Millions Seek Unions
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fred Wright
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Labor History, Union Organization, Politics and Legislation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: First Panel: Man distributing literature on the National Industrial Recovery Act. Second Panel: Picket for union organization. Third Panel: American Federation of Labor officials discussing their objection to industrial unions.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Fred Wright Original Cartoons (Subgroup 13.1), Fred Wright Papers (UE.13)
